/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the driver's seat of a car, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, providing a stark contrast to the gray, overcast sky. A yellow bus and a white car are visible on the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. In the distance, a mountain covered in trees looms, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and the mountain, and adds depth to the scene. The colors in the image are somewhat muted due to the overcast sky, but the yellow of the bus and the white of the car stand out, adding vibrancy to the scene.
